title: First Book
description: This can be very short, like a book blurb. You want just enough social proof to make them keep reading.

title: Second Book
description: Will it make them happy or rich? Will it help them lose weight or have more friends? What do they get once they read this book?

title: The Blue Book
description: This is about letting the reader know why they should listen to you. Why you’re the guide they want to lead them through this journey.

title: Some Random Book
description: On even better, what the reader will get out of reading the book—how will their life transform because of this book?
